description: Available applications from edmerix.github.io base source

display.name: Display
display.help:
display command displays an image at the address specified as the first argument.
Optional following arguments are values for maximum width, height and the alpha (opacity) of the image:
w,h, and a respectively
e.g. to display an image at address "test.png" with maximum width of 50% the window, at 70% opacity, type:
display test.png 50w 0.7a

localstore.name: Local Store
localstore.description: Basic storage of variables in the browser's localstorage

nano.name: Nano Text Editor
nano.description: The beginnings of a nano-like text editor (WIP)

notebook.name: Notebook
notebook.description: A program to view/edit/delete your notes from the note function (WIP)

session.name: Session
session.description: Manage multiple terminal sessions in one window
